Title: Jim & Andy: The Great Beyond
Actors: Jim Carrey, Danny DeVito, Milos Forman, Peter Bonerz
Plot: A behind-the-scenes look at how Jim Carrey adopted the persona of idiosyncratic comedian Andy Kaufman on the set of Man on the Moon (1999).
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 3 wins & 6 nominations.
